DOC.brief_title: Seasonal Malaria Chemoprevention With Without Lipid-based Nutrient Supplement Children Aged 6-59 Months Mali
DOC.detailed_description: Main objective : To compare confirmed case malaria among child age 6-59 month group receive SMC combine LNS ( intervention group ) group receive SMC ( control group ) monthly SMC distribution session ( 4 round ) Secondary objective : To compare among child age 6-59 month two group - Fever case - Acute malnutrition case ( global , moderate severe ) - Medical referral case reason Study site : The study conduct 18 health area Kolokani Circle , Koulikoro region , Mali . Each group ( intervention control group ) compose 9 health area . Number participant : Between 17500 22000 group ( estimation )
